name: Working with UX Writers in Figma: Config 2022 talk
description:
This is the deck that Figma's UX Writing team put together for our Config 2022 conference talk. 


You can watch a video of the talk on YouTube.


What was the talk about, you ask? Great question! Here's our talk blurb:


Figma is a collaborative space, and if you’re on a larger team you probably have UX writers/content designers working in your design files. It’s exciting! And a little awkward. Both for designers trying to make every pixel perfect, and for writers trying to figure out what they’re allowed to change.


In this talk, Figma’s UX writing team shares their favorite tips for designers on using Figma to deepen the creative bond with writers, and build more intuitive, delightful products together.
